'''14w11b''' is the eighteenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on March 13, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140314091132/https://mojang.com/2014/03/minecraft-snapshot-14w11a/|date=March 13, 2014|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w11b|author=[[Dinnerbone]]|website=Mojang.com}}</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in [[14w11a]].

This snapshot was reuploaded.{{More info}}{{Citation needed}}

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''Block models'''
* Generic blocks now load models and not predefined block shapes.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Endermite]]s'''
* No longer despawn when named, though PersistenceRequired is still ignored.

== Trivia ==
* 14w11b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
